description: George I bullet teapot, silver, engraved with small later crest; Holiday Traditions, Northumberland Room
inscription:
Mark and Inscription

Unidentified crest on side.  Similar crests are borne by several families in England and Scotland.  Assuming the initials are contemporary with the crest, it could indicate the Cornish family of Kestell.
markings:

title: Teapot
